title._content: [Mountain howitzer of the 5th Ohio Cavalry Company]  (LOC)

description._content: [Mountain howitzer of the 5th Ohio Cavalry Company] [1861] 1 photograph : quarter-plate tintype ; 9.3 x 11.9 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather; birds and grapes design. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (D066) Purchased from: Rick Carlile, 2012. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Subjects: United States.--Army.--Ohio Cavalry Company, 5th (1861)--Equipment & supplies. Howitzers--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Equipment & supplies--Union. Format: Tintypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.34977 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 3071
